attributes.action: Ensure that refereeing decisons go in favour of Partick Thistle in a dynamic drive to positive discrimination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oftentimes I have seen smaller clubs not be given the 'rub of the green' by referees and now I wish to redress the balance by petitioning Mr Blair to instruct refs to give Partick Thistle every conceivable break in a game of football.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
